artist: Author: Jean-Antoine Lebrun-Tossa; Publisher: François Buisson
creditline:
The Minnich Collection
The Ethel Morrison Van Derlip Fund, 1966
description: Folded sheet from fashion periodical (P.15,626); man at left in white breeches, patterned vest, and green coat holding a black hat; woman at right holds a fan in a white gown with floral pattern at hem, a yellow shawl with blue stripes, and a hat with orange plumes
portfolio: From Journal de la Mode et du Goût, ou amusemens du salon et de la toilette, Paris, 1790–92
title: Fashion plate from Journal de la Mode et du Goût, Seconde Année, Quinzième Cahier, 15 Juillet 1791
